tr.td: Defiance win coin toss and defers to the 2nd half
Seth Bauer kickoff 55 yards to the BW10, T. Washington return 19 yards to the BW29 (Jalin Nealy).
PENALTY BW delay of game (Robbie Plagens) 5 yards to the BW24.
